entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 10.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
